Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2)
Please read the FAQ section & other posts on your topic before posting in Miscellaneous Q&A.
We expect everyone to have read the FAQ & Beginner's Information before posting!
The goal in maintaining this Archive is to have a concise Monster Rancher 3 guide.
Also note that there is an Official Strategy Guide for this game.
You can purchase a copy by clicking the Prima link on the left.
Off-topic posts & those answerable with "Read the Archive" are flagged & deleted within 2 days.
You may also wish to visit The D's Hall Of Fame!
